scripts.clean:modules: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules && echo 'node_modules cleaned.'
scripts.test: npm test --prefix frontend && npm test --prefix backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix backend
scripts.local:install: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.local:dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
